room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Kidnapping was my least favorite room offered by Breakout Games Cincinnati. The biggest complaint by my large group was that the room is physically very small and simply cannot contain the maximum number of people it advertises. It is too cramped to move and solve puzzles effectively. So, if you go, I'd recommend 4 people max. The room got incredibly hot and miserable. The idea is good. Ambiance is better than average (at first). But the experience is limited to one small, sparsely decorated room with very little interaction. Fairly straightforward puzzles, but on-theme. The "handcuffed" thing is kind of trope-y for the seasoned escape game enthusiast. Anyway, I recommend this room overall (6/10) but rank it as the worst offering from Breakout Games Cincinnati. Play this game last (or not at all, if claustrophobia/heat/lack of design immersion is not your thing) when visiting Breakout Games Cincinnati.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Break Out Games Kidnapping was a thrilling experience that evokes the problem solver inside of you. Great fun for family and friends. The experience is worth the expense as well.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We did the kidnap room today while we had family in from Texas. Kirsten was our game master and she was awesome! We had such a great time and escaped with 2 minutes and 34 secs to spare. Can't wait to go back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: This was my second time at Breakout. We did Casino for a bachelor party last year and Kidnapping for another one this year. Both were pretty challenging and we got out with just a few minutes left. Weâ€™re already planning on coming back to try out the other rooms, and I hope they add more soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We were Kidnapped and managed to get to the last clue. We should have asked for a hint 5 minutes sooner and we may have broken out in time. Clues were tricky and challenging but not impossible. Lots of trial and error. Next time we will need to put one person in charge even. Some red herring clues wasted some time for us but we all had a great time and would love to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: I did the kidnapping game today with my family and it was so much fun. I had a blast. I would definitely do something like this again!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We had a blast! We did the kidnapping. The flow was great and the clues were well thought out. Our game master was helpful and made it more fun! Made it out in 45 minutes!
